law.catch_line: Appointment of Kentucky state poet laureate or writer laureate.

text.section: Every two (2) years the Governor may appoint a Kentucky state poet laureate or writer laureate for a maximum term of two (2) years.
The Kentucky poet laureate or writer laureate shall serve without salary except that he may be reimbursed for expenses.

law.history: Created 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 65, sec. 1, effective July 13, 1990.
